page.title: 03Employment Survey
page.content: All six schools surveying 'D' block 02920093 asked parents about their jobs.The majority of the parents live in this block but by no means all of them. The survey gives an idea of the kind of jobs parents of pupils at the six schools do.All parents were asked the same questions and a total of 834 replies were received (of about 1500). {Agriculture,Forestry and Fishing 16 {Mining and quarrying 3 {Manufacturing 76 {Construction(Building & Decorating)132 {Trade(Retail & Wholesale) 180 {Transport 78 {Public & Professional Service 533 {Domestic Service 83 {Armed forces 15 {Unemployed 54 {TOTAL 1170 Some parents thought we should have included housewife! We agree.
